What are some important considerations and limitations when working with PBaaS chains in the Verus Desktop, and what kind of license and warranty does the software come with?

When working with PBaaS chains in the Verus Desktop, there are some important considerations and limitations to keep in mind. One key limitation is that if a currency is already supported in the Verus Desktop, such as BTC or ETH, you will not be able to use those same named currencies as a PBaaS chain. This is a temporary limitation and will be resolved before the mainnet release.

It's also important to note that the software is still experimental and unfinished, and users should be aware that they use it at their own risk.
